local_intent: Perceive red plate, align and move to its center, lower until contact, release white plate, verify release, and retreat.
assumptions: White plate currently held in gripper
Red plate is within reachable workspace and visible
Workspace clear for approach and retreat
coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer phase steps from the global plan: detect/place on red plate by moving to center, lowering until contact, opening gripper to release, then retreating.
